name: yaaisuw-website
description: Official website for YAAISUW - Building intelligent solutions powered by real people and real AIs

scripts.clean: if exist dist (rmdir /s /q dist) && mkdir dist
scripts.copy:assets: xcopy /E /I /Y assets dist\assets && copy /Y index.html dist\
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && if not exist dist\assets\images mkdir dist\assets\images
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:css
scripts.start: if not exist dist (mkdir dist) && copy /Y nul dist\output.css >nul && start index.html

author: YAAISUW Team
